freeBoard.update: UPDATE tb_free_board SET `title` = ?, `content` = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ? AND user_id = ?
freeBoard.delete: DELETE FROM tb_free_board WHERE id = ? AND user_id = ?
freeBoard.select: SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.title, f.content, f.created_at, f.views , u.name , count(l.user_id) AS like_count, count(c.id) AS comment_count FROM tb_free_board AS f LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_free_board_comments AS c ON f.id = c.free_board_id LEFT JOIN tb_like AS l ON f.id = l.free_board_id WHERE f.id = ? GROUP BY f.id, f.title, f.content, f.created_at, f.views, u.name
freeBoard.selectAll: SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.created_at, f.views , u.name , count(l.user_id) AS like_count, count(c.id) AS comment_count  FROM tb_free_board AS f LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_free_board_comments AS c ON f.id = c.free_board_id LEFT JOIN tb_like AS l ON f.id = l.free_board_id GROUP BY f.id, f.title, f.content, f.created_at, f.views, u.name ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT ?, ?
freeBoard.selectSearch: SELECT f.id, f.title, f.created_at, f.views , u.name , count(l.user_id) AS like_count, count(c.id) AS comment_count FROM tb_free_board AS f LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_free_board_comments AS c ON f.id = c.free_board_id LEFT JOIN tb_like AS l ON f.id = l.free_board_id WHERE f.title LIKE ? GROUP BY f.id, f.title, f.content, f.created_at, f.views, u.name ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT ?, ?

freeBoardComments.update: UPDATE tb_free_board_comments SET `content` = ? WHERE id = ? AND free_board_id = ? AND user_id = ?
freeBoardComments.delete: DELETE FROM tb_free_board_comments WHERE id = ? AND free_board_id = ? AND user_id = ?
freeBoardComments.select: SELECT f.content, f.created_at, f.user_id, u.name, u.role, count(l.user_id) AS like_count FROM tb_free_board_comments AS f LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_like AS l ON f.id = l.free_board_comments_id WHERE f.id = ? AND f.free_board_id = ? GROUP BY f.content, f.created_at, f.user_id, u.name, u.role
freeBoardComments.selectAll: SELECT f.content, f.created_at, f.user_id, u.name, u.role, count(l.user_id) AS like_count FROM tb_free_board_comments AS f LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_like AS l ON f.id = l.free_board_comments_id WHERE f.free_board_id = ? GROUP BY f.content, f.created_at, f.user_id, u.name, u.role LIMIT ?, ?

like.deleteFreeBoard: DELETE FROM tb_like WHERE user_id = ? AND free_board_id = ?
like.selectFreeBoardComments: SELECT * FROM tb_like WHERE user_id = ? AND free_board_comments_id = ?
like.deleteFreeBoardComments: DELETE FROM tb_like WHERE user_id = ? AND free_board_comments_id = ?
